Html:
Downloaded and installed the samples for SQL 2005.  It doesn't seem to contain the AW database....

Is there a seperate download?

Also, if I may suggest, adding some type of master index to the root of the Samples directory would really make it easier to navigate.

Same to me. I tried to install AdventureWorksDB.msi and also SqlServerSamples.msi
(source code, 25433K, uploaded May 7 2007) none seem to contain AdventuraWorks 2005 database.
I don't know if it makes any difference, but I am installing on Vista Business.

Any clue?

Thanks

Ok, I was assuming that the msi instalation would attach the database automatically. Even though, the only installation that contains AW database is the AdventureWorksDB.msi and not SqlServerSamples.msi. I installed it again and follow the steps to attach the database:

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa992075(VS.80).aspx

Thanks anyway.

Leonardo.
